entry.title: Looks
entry.summary:
Author: Vike02002

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,831Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 24

Summary: There is no doubt that Buck feels something for Eddie. Just by the way he always talks about him, he misses him, he thinks about him all the time. Buck is a very sensitive man, so it doesn’t really impress anyone.But Eddie ?Oh man, Eddie ?It’s all about the looks.ORWhen Buck disappears after a full traumatising accident, no one seems to realise he's gone. But when they realise he sees his best friend everywhere, panic start to settle.ORA slow-burn, with ups and downs (mostly downs) endangered characters and emotional confidences.NB : Dear readers, I am not english at all, only working with IA and my 4 years language studies, so... Yeah, don't blame me for the few mistakes :)

entry.title: The Wild Boy
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,119Chapters: 28/28Kudos: 695

Summary: The 118 get a call to some nearby woodlands where the police are waiting for their assistance. Athena tells them that they need to help with a little boy that had gotten his leg stuck in a beartrap. All seems simple but then she tells them that the boy is a feral child, animalistic and frightened, and was throwing rocks at people who tried to get closer. Buck and Eddie are tasked to get him to safety.The boy is scared of everything around him, people, sounds, objects, the wind, the smells. Terror is all the boy knew until he found something he wasn’t scared of.And its name was Evan Buckley. :3Warnings - Heavy descriptions of medical trauma, child abuse, neglect and injury.Queue found family, Christopher being an amazing big brother and the 118 being the best family in the entire world. :3

entry.title: It Might Blow Up In Your Pretty Face
entry.summary:
Author: isthatacatsherlock

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,467Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: After the confession, Eddie was more beautiful, laying in bed on facetime, wearing a rumpled up shirt and rubbing his eyes. “Morning, Handsome,” Buck said, watching him, eating another piece of the orange in front of him.“Morning. I told you some things last night, didn’t I?”“Yeah. Would you like me to pretend you didn’t?” He couldn’t. The confession would forever color every interaction they’d have, and Buck didn’t know how he could manage being his best friend knowing something else was possible.“No, but, like…did I ruin everything with my stupid big mouth?”

entry.title: There’s a Light that’s Cutting Through the Darkness
entry.summary:
Author: K0maeda_88

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 144,744Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 405

Summary: Evan Buckley was out, and proud. He has his first boyfriend, Tommy Kinard. He couldn’t have been more happy. Or at least, that should’ve been the case.Eddie Diaz has always been able to read his best friend like an open book. Not that Buck made it obvious; Eddie just knew him on a level no one else understood. So when Buck starts changing after getting together with Tommy, Eddie is immediately suspicious. But no one else seems to notice; so what if he’s just making it all up? Maybe he was. or maybe, he just wanted Buck for himself.But Eddie swears that there is definitely something wrong there.And he is determined to find out what it is.

entry.title: come back, be here
entry.summary:
Author: reyesdiaz (whateverthecalamity)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,807Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 25

Summary: Buck just sort of watches his phone screen. The way Eddie’s smile broadens when he glances back down, the softness in his eyes, the lighter sound in his laugh. God, Buck’s missed that. He’s missed seeing Eddie like this, so happy. He missed seeing Eddie and Chris together, joking, laughing; wanting to be in each other’s company and actually enjoying occupying that space together. They’re so happy.But they’re so far, and Evan’s here. Alone.Or the one where Eddie calls from El Paso, and Buck tries - and fails - to manage his feelings about it.

entry.summary:
Author: mgxeen

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,113Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 10

Summary: Eddie is missing home, not the house of course but his REAL home, Evan Buckley. He doesn’t know why he misses his best friend so much… maybe he doesn’t see him as his best friend anymore. He struggles as he tries to keep his cool everytime he calls buck, but everyday its getting harder and harder to deny the fact that he IS in fact in love with his best friend.Buck on the other hand is struggling to keep friends and unfortunately makes a big mistake by sleeping with his ex boyfriend. He is fighting the urge to to get a plane ticket, come to Texas, take Eddie and Chris home. To him.But her can’t because his STRAIGHT best friend doesn’t love him back.ORBuck and Eddie are fighting/denying their feelings resolving in some conflicts, but maybe in a angry love confession, Who knows? not you guys.

entry.title: The Bolter
entry.summary:
Author: Jack3402

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,619Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 283

Summary: From a very young age, Evan Buckley knew he would end up alone.After Eddie leaves to go after Chris, Buck knows that he needs to get out of Los Angeles for a while. He travels just like he did before he joined the 118, looking for a reason to keep going after losing the family he thought would finally stay.Eddie moves to Texas and slowly but surely gains the trust of his son back. After 4 long months of long conversations and hard realizations, Christopher finally wants to move back to Los Angeles.But what happens when they return and Buck is nowhere to be found, and nobody but Maddie is able to get in contact with him? What happens when Eddie finds out just how badly he hurt the love of his life, and now he can't tell him just how much he truly needs him to be okay?

entry.title: The Sun Will Shine Even When It's Covered by Clouds (So Will You)
entry.summary:
Author: solaris_sunspot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,083Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 86

Summary: The sun was hidden behind the clouds, but that didn’t stop Evan. He ran out to the garage and pulled out Danny’s old bike to try and ride it. His parents were at work, Maddie was inside doing homework, and Danny was…well, he couldn’t remember where Danny was, he was pretty sure he was playing a video game. He had told Maddie and Daniel that he was gonna ride a bike, and they said he could, as long as one of them could see him from their spot in the house. Evan thought that was pretty fair, so here he was. He got onto the bike and tried to ride it, key word try. Dannys old bike didn’t have training wheels, which was hard, but he had to learn so he could ride his bike with Maddie and Danny! So he kept trying.

entry.title: "She Loves Me": a Buddie AU of a Golden Age Musical
entry.summary:
Author: HeraklesIsBi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 345Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: It's 2022 and the 118 gets a new recruit: Edmundo "Eddie" Diaz. Diaz gets along well his Captain Bobby Nash, Hen, Chimney, the new probie Ravi, and kind of Tommy Kinard. The one person he doesn't get off to a great start with? Evan "Buck" Buckley. Throughout the next six months, the gang's love lives and non-romantic trysts are revealed. Here is my queer, 911, modern, AU version of "She Loves Me". Enjoy!
